2025-11-17.content:
You can now use [Hyperdisk Storage Pools](https://docs.cloud.google.com/compute/docs/disks/storage-pools)
with migrating VMs if you need large-scale storage. Hyperdisk Storage Pools
help you manage large-scale storage and can optimize costs and performance.

summary.title: Hyperdisk Storage Pools for Migrating VMs
summary.summary: Large-scale storage is now available for migrating VMs using Hyperdisk Storage Pools. This feature helps manage storage efficiently, optimizing both cost and performance.

2025-10-16.content:
Migrate to Virtual Machines now supports all available versions of AlmaLinux
EL 8 and 9.

summary.title: AlmaLinux Support Extended
summary.summary: Migrate to Virtual Machines now supports all available versions of AlmaLinux EL 8 and 9.

2025-08-25.content: **Generally available:** The Basic Input/Output System (BIOS) to Unified Extensible Firmware Interface (UEFI) conversion option is now generally available. Migrate to Virtual Machines lets you convert the OS boot type of a VM instance from BIOS to UEFI. This option is useful when you want to securely boot your VM instance, as secure boot is only supported by UEFI. For more information, see the table in [Configure the target for a migrated VM](https://cloud.google.com/migrate/virtual-machines/docs/5.0/migrate/migrating-vms#configure-target).

summary.title: BIOS to UEFI Conversion Now Available
summary.summary: The conversion of BIOS to UEFI boot type for VM instances is now generally available. This feature is beneficial for enabling secure boot, which requires UEFI.

2025-06-20.content: Starting with version Migrate Connector 2.7, throttling is supported for a second NIC.

summary.title: Throttling Support for Second NIC in Migrate Connector
summary.summary: Starting with version 2.7, the Migrate Connector supports throttling for a second network interface.
